title: AssignmentAttemptRejection
description: Describes a negative result from the back-office of an attempt to sign on or off a block from MADT or another GUI

eventTimestamp.description: ISO 8601. Reflects the current UTC time.

traceId.description: A unique identifier to be able to trace this message. Also used to detect duplicate messages received.

fromDateTime.description: Time from which the sign on/off was supposed to apply. ISO 8601, UTC

blockRef.description: Optional. Not provided for sign off. Otherwise the Block identifier.

errorText.description: Optional. Only provided if there is an error text.
